activities: We work with publishers, advertising technology companies, our clients and other data sources to collect or generate information about individual or device activity, characteristics or preferences.  This information described above is used primarily to provide relevant advertising and related analytics and data services. We also receive personal information of our business contacts, such as during the registration process, and we use this information primarily for our account management and marketing purposes.  More detail on all of these topics appears in our Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: (1) Data about past, current and prospective customers of our clients and other actual or prospective recipients of advertising and (2) Contact information of our business contacts, such as those that register on our website.  This includes data processed manually and through automated means.
